doc.previous: In either case, the roots of Q are the roots of the factors, which may be computed by solving quadratic or cubic equations.
doc.after: A very special case of the first case of factorization is when a0=0. This implies that x1=0 is a first root, b3=a4, b2=a3, b1=a2, b0=a1, and the other roots may be computed by solving a cubic equation.
